title: Pool Party ARAM
body: Drop your name need the first 4 peeps. Will add the others later

replies.body:
Hey **omgrandompikachu**,

For your convenience, the following chatrooms have been made for the Pool Party event:
1. poolparty
2. poolparty2
3. poolparty3 (if the other two become full)

You can easily recruit and invite players through these chatrooms, and find other players who are looking to play the same mode! To join a chatroom, open the buddy list, click on the center speech bubble icon, and click on the folder with a plus sign. 

If you're recruiting for a match, you can use the shortcut "R > ", for example: 
> "R > 3 players for SRift", or even "R > SRift Support"

If you're looking to join a group, you can use the shortcut " LF", for example: 
> "LF ARAM"
